subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Volvo Ocean Race
lead_paragraph: A young American-led team took the opening honors of the Volvo Ocean Race 2014-15 with a surprise victory in the in-port race in Alicante, Spain.
snippet: A young American-led team took the opening honors of the Volvo Ocean Race 2014-15 with a surprise victory in the in-port race in Alicante, Spain.
